title: Part 4.  Client's Consent to Representation and  Signature

questions.description: Select I request that U S C I S send original notices on an application or petition to the business address of my attorney as listed in this form
questions.tool_tip: Part 4. Client's Consent to Representation and Signature. Consent to Representation and Release of Information. I have requested the representation of and consented to being represented by the attorney named in Part 1. of this form.  According to the Privacy Act of 1974 and U.S. Department of Homeland Security (D H S) policy, I also consent to the disclosure to the named attorney of any record pertaining to me that appears in any system of records of U S C I S, ICE, or C B P. Options Regarding Receipt of U S C I S Notices. U S C I S will send notices to both a represented party (the client) and his, her, or its attorney or accredited representative either through mail or electronic delivery.  If you want to have notices sent to your attorney rather than to you, please select Item Number 1. below.  You may change this election through written notice to U S C I S. 1. Select I request that U S C I S send original notices on an application or petition to the business address of my attorney as listed in this form.

Part 4. Client's Consent to Representation and Signature. Signature of Client or Authorized Signatory for an Entity. 2. A. Signature of Client or Authorized Signatory for an Entity. This signature field can not be signed with a digital signature and the signee's name can not be typewritten into this space. This is a protected field. Print and sign in ink.

questions.description: Enter as 2-digit Month, 2-digit Day, and 4-digit Year
questions.tool_tip: Part 4. Client's Consent to Representation and Signature. Signature of Client or Authorized Signatory for an Entity. 2. B. Enter Date of Signature. Enter as 2-digit Month, 2-digit Day, and 4-digit Year.

Part 5. Signature of Attorney. I have read and understand the regulations and conditions contained in 8 Code of Federal Regulation (C F R) 1 03.2 and 2 92 governing appearances and representation before D H S. I declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States that the information I have provided on this form is true and correct. 1. A. Signature of Attorney. This signature field can not be signed with a digital signature and the signee's name can not be typewritten into this space. This is a protected field. Print and sign in ink.

questions.description: Enter as 2-digit Month, 2-digit Day, and 4-digit Year
questions.tool_tip: Part 5. Signature of Attorney. 1. B. Enter Date of Signature. Enter as 2-digit Month, 2-digit Day, and 4-digit Year.
